title: Textile, 1956
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave
description: Length of printed cotton designed in honor of President Dwight D. Eisenhower. The design is arranged in the manner of a French early 19th century print, with scenes in medallions from the President's life: the Abilene house, West Point, Columbia University, The White House, the Gettysburg house, and the Denver house. Enframement of oak leaves and flowers, military trophies, and the Republican elephant. In blue and white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1956.
1956. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed on plain weave. Gift of Elisabeth Draper, Inc.. 1956-25-1-d.
